#include <cstdio>
int main()
{
	int t ;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int a,b;
		scanf("%d %d",&a,&b) ;
		if(a < b) printf("No Number\n");

		else if( a == b )
		{
			if( a % 2 == 0 && b % 2 == 0 )
			{
				printf("%d\n",a+b);
			}
			else
				printf("%d\n",a+b-1);
		}
		else if ( a > b )
		{
			if(	a-b == 2 && ( a % 2 == 0 && b % 2 == 0 ) )
				printf("%d\n",a+b);
			else if( a-b == 2 && ( a%2!=0 || b%2!=0 ) )
			{
				printf("%d\n",a+b-1);
			}
			else
				printf("No Number\n");
		}
	}
	return 0 ;
}
